import { gql } from 'apollo-boost';
export const fragment = {
  CategoryFields: gql`
    fragment Category on Category {
      id
      name
      createTime
      updateTime
      isDelete
      isEnable
      remark

      fullParentId

      userId

  `,

      type
    }
  `,

    fragment DataConfigFields on DataConfig {
